[He]0-i looks at [me]1425-i as if [he]0-i does n’t plan to forget a single feature of [my]1425-i face . [We]2175-we look at [each other]1468-each other as if for the first time . “[1425-i] Let ’s have a do - over , ” [he]0-i says , tugging [me]1425-i close . “[1425-i] No . ” [I]1425-i shake [my]1425-i head , pressing [my]1425-i cheek to [his]0-i chest . “[1425-i] [I]0-i do n’t want to have missed a thing . ” “[0-i] Then let ’s not miss a thing of what ’s coming . ” [He]0-i looks down at [me]160-babies and brushes [my]160-babies lips with [his]0-i thumb . “[160-babies] [Babies]160-babies . ” [I]160-babies nod . “[160-babies] Marriage . ” [I]160-babies nod . “[160-babies] Considering [I]0-i ’m marrying [you]1426-you in [City Hall]1427-city hall as fast as [I]0-i can … can [I]0-i at least have [your]1426-you name ? ” [I]75-bryn laugh , cheeks burning . “[75-bryn] [Bryn]75-bryn . ” “[75-bryn] [Bryn]75-bryn . [I]0-i ’m [Aaric]64-christos , ” [he]0-i says , cupping [my]75-bryn cheek in one big hand and bringing [his]0-i eyes to look deep into [mine]75-bryn , giving [me]75-bryn the most devastating grin . “[75-bryn] [Bryn]75-bryn , [I]0-i see [my]0-i future in [your]75-bryn eyes . ”[75-bryn]

[DEAR READERS]161-dear readers , Thanks so much for picking up [Tycoon]44-tycoon . [I]0-i hope [you]161-dear readers enjoyed [Christos]64-christos and [Bryn]75-bryn ’s story as much as [I]0-i did writing it . And most definitely , yes ! [Sara]60-sara and [Ian]147-ian are next ! :D XOXO ,
